name: Light Beyond the Horizon
description: This theme immerses you in a surreal landscape of distant mountain peaks bathed in soft light, with a cosmic backdrop that hints at the vastness of the universe. The gentle glow on the horizon adds a sense of mystery and tranquility, ideal for late-night browsing or moments of quiet reflection. A perfect balance of dark tones with subtle highlights makes it easy on the eyes while adding depth and intrigue to your browser.
